summary: Immerse yourself in Skyrims deep, complex history by adding a wide range of lore-related books to your game!
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]iaDA_GCSSDI[/youtube][/center]
If you feel that Skyrim lacks the necessary books to fully immerse your player in Skyrims history and unlock the complex stories of Skyrims past, then fear no more. This mod will add a number of new books to your game! Although right now there arent too many books to read more books will be added in new updates.

If you want to read an introduction to this mod, then a new book can be found on the far-right table in Dragonsreach near the back of the room.

(Apologies for the lack of punctuation in this description. Nexus has an issue with apostrophes and likes to add full-stops everywhere)
author: Aaron Yarborough
